data.text: @Louu_HK Hi Lucy, congratulation and pre happy birthday:) You can consider to contact our local reservation team to request a cake for his birthday at a cost of HKD300 (equivalent to local currency) 24 hours prior flight departure and celebrate this memorable journey:) - Anna

- Liz

@Ntbluett You're most welcome:)

data.text: @gawa2lang We're sorry that the flight delay is due to the adverse weather that is out of our control. Rest assured our airport team will try their best to assist if you require any assistance! - Chloe
@FlyFreq Hi there. We are sorry to let you down. Mind providing us your eTicket number, full name and email address through DM? We will pass your case to Customer Relations Team. Thank you. - Anna
@Surajjoseph11 We're sorry to disappoint you. Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM so we can look into it? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Worldhopping Hi there, we are so sorry about that :( Mind DM us your e-ticket number, full name and email address so that we can pass your case to our customer relations team for follow-up? Once again, we apologize for any inconvenience caused! - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@AshutoshManohar As we have replied you through DM that we are now checking with our team about that and we are happy to reserve seat for you on our end 48 hours before departure. You may reach us again by then. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused :(  - Holly
@AshutoshManohar Hi there, we have replied you through DM! - Holly
@theblondwombat Hi there, can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Captain_FBS Hi Goddy, we replied you in private message and will provide assist there. Thank you. - Anna
@justmeokay11 Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@ulywang Hi there. An e-cigarette This can only be carried on board either on one’s person or in your cabin baggage. It must not be used on the plane and must not be placed in your check in baggage. Recharging electronic cigarettes or its batteries on board is not permitted. - Anna

@ridwanyoung Here you go :
Flight enquiries (24hours English service is available):
001-803-852-9072 / 007-803-852-9072 (Local Toll Free)
+852 2747 3342 (From overseas countries, please note overseas charge may apply)
Email: jkt#pax@cathaypacific.com
- Chloe
@shivramgopal @cathaypacificIN You may approach our airport staff at the airport by then to see what their arrangement will be. Thank you for your understanding - Holly
@aburrous Hi there, we have replied you through DM! - Holly

@shivramgopal @cathaypacificIN If your original flights that is operated by us have been delayed, we would help to arrange the next available flights. Please approach our airport staff at the airport for further assistance by then - Holly
@shivramgopal @cathaypacificIN Hi there, the minimum connecting time at the Hong Kong International Airport is 55 minutes so you shall have enough time for the transit - Holly
@VRonDotCom Hi Veronica, mind DM us their 13-digit e-ticket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text:
With awe-inspiring scenery and adventurous pit-stops on the way, take a #roadtrip from #SanFrancisco to #Seattle. We’ve got direct flights to both destinations and here’s our guide of things to see and do en route: https://t.co/ztPXwlQwCs

Credit: Cameron Venti on Unsplash https://t.co/64lDddYeuI
@rajat_bamb Hi there. We are sorry to hear about that. In your case, please contact airport for further assistance. Hope for understanding. - Anna

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @epued Check out our fares on our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr! This will be the easiest way for you to get the latest fares and make a booking.
@ashuzutshi Hi Ashish, may i know did you report to the airport baggage team? -Elsa
@ShaneaSavours @DragonAirRBLX We are so sorry about that, we will urge the team for you and inform team to contact you shortly -Elsa
@ShaneaSavours @DragonAirRBLX We didn't receive any DM from you yet. Mind DM us once again via below link? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ShaneaSavours @DragonAirRBLX Sorry to hear this, can you DM us with the eTicket number and passenger name so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@petitegalloise Hi Georgia, you may apply a flight certificate via https://t.co/MBwuFojaMn -Ella
@bombaysunshine We received your private message and replied you there. Thanks  -Ella
@p3ngzhi Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@mustikakiky Meanwhile, you are strongly advised to delete the public comments which contains your personal information due to safety. (2/2) -Ella

@mustikakiky We note that your ticket was issued with a travel agent, unfortunately we are unable to check out the terms and conditions. We recommend you to contact your travel agent for follow-up.  (1/2) -Ella
@philippdolder Mind providing us the screenshot through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@philippdolder Hi there. Thank you for letting us know. We will pass it to team for investigation. Once again, sorry for any inconvenience caused. Thank you. - Anna

@CalStampMusic Hi there. We are sorry about that. Mind providing us your eTicket number, full name and email address through DM? We will pass your case to Customer Relations Team to investigate and contact you shortly. Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@LaurensiusA1 I'm afraid other internet connection may not be available to use during in flight. -Ella
